1.12.2.0.5.1:
alpha: add Key Ring
Fixed dedicated server crash.
1.12.2.0.5.2:
alpha: add Dread Pirate Chest
Added Lava Trap Pit
Add Spider, Ruby and Sapphire Lock and Key.
Fixed Key Ring inventory shift-click on item.
Fixed Key Ring unlocking multiple locks.
1.12.2.0.5.3:
alpha: fixed DB script.
Added DB as a resource that is copied to the file system.
Added Compressor Chest
Added Wither Log
Fixed all blockstates.
1.12.2.0.5.4: alpha: add Jewelled Key, Wither Tree, Wither Chest, Wither Lock, Wither Key, Fog, Poison Fog, Wither Fog
1.12.2.0.6.0:
alpha: updated to use Forge 14.23.4.2705
Using Loot Tables instead of custom loot generation.
Fixed chest registry check for Wither Chest.
Fixed chunk count reset in world generators.
Added 6 epic (extra powerful) potions.
Fixed Skeleton Key so that it doesnt open Wither Chests.
Added Spanish Moss.
Tweaking the Pit gen settings.
Added probability config for fog.
Randomize fog generation and size.
Added Mob Trapped Pit.
1.12.2.0.7.0:
beta: add Treasure Tool.
Updated recipes.
Updated tooltips to reflect what is craftable.
General Clean up.
1.12.2.0.8.0:
beta: add config option to enable/disable Lock drops when unlocked.
Fix Wither Tree Gen data not being saved to NBT.
Added Savanna to the Wither Tree biome white list.
-Fixed HUGE bug where the chest wasnt saving its inventory and state if it was locked when broken.
Added dump() method to TreasureChestBlock.
1.12.2.0.9.0:
beta: fixed when breaking Wither Chest top, that it does not spawn a Wither Chest Top item.
Fixed when scrolling over Wither Chest Top item crashes game.
Fix Wither Log rotations when placed.
Added Wither Planks.
Fixed lock rotations when re-placing locked chest.
Fixed bug where you could drop Key Ring when inventory is open and make duplicate keys.
Fixed Tooltips not rendering in custom GUIs.
1.12.2.1.0.0:
Version Release: fixed Worldgen error on servers.
Adding Wood Mimic.
Code cleanup.
1.12.2.1.0.1:
Fixed keys and keys in keyrings not being damaged on use.
Changed default probability of key success from 100% to 90%.
1.12.2.1.1.0:
Update to Forge 14.23.5.2768
Fixed Cocoa beans in loot tables (changed to a dye).
Fixed Ruby, Sapphire, Metallurgists and Skeleton keys not being included in loot tables.
Moved emerald key to the correct loot_tables.
Fixed Skull Sword entry in loot table (was referencing a gold coin).
Added foreign mod support for loot tables.
Adding lockpicks success probabilities to item info.
Fixed Pilferers abiliy to open uncommon locks.
Changed the sound of falling Fog from stone to snow.
Re-balanced lock selection such that rarity-level chests cannot have higher rarity-level locks. ie, a rare lock cannot appear on a scarce chest.
Updated Key Rings to only allow stack size of one (1).
Fixed not being able to use locks/keys on a mimic.
Update so that all scarce+ chests have at least one lock.
Fixed Irong and Gold Strongbox name.
1.12.2.1.2.0:
Added Blocks painting collection.
Added custom LootCondition -> mod_present.
Added some SGS Metals items to built-in loot tables.
Fixed more Skull Sword entries in loot tables.
Fixed Iron Key entries in loot tables.
Updated TreasureChestCommand to correctly generate a chest based on given rarity.
Added Skull Chest.
Fixed uncommon armor_tool_chest loot table entry for mocreatures.
Added recipe to craft skull chest.
Fixed some mocreatures loot table entries.
1.12.2.1.3.0:
Renamed TreasureChestCommand to SpawnChestCommand.
Fixed 2x2 recipes to show up in players crafting box.
Added advancements for recipes.
Increased Wither Chests inventory size and added new inventory GUI.
Added Eye Patch to the loot tables.
Added Gold Skull Chest.
Added Sapphire and Ruby items and ore.
Make Keys unstackable.
Fixed Key Ring decrement by 8 bug.
Add SwapIfModPresent loot table function.
Fix pickup/throw KeyRing when its inventory gui is open.
Added two new pit trap.
1.12.2.1.3.1:
Fixed BigBottomMobTrapPitGenerator to generate the entire pit correctly -> no missing layers.
Added Proximity Block/Spawner.
Updated BigBottomMobTrapPitGenerator to use ProximityBlocks to generate mobs.
Fixed skull and bones block bounding box and rendering.
Fixed Held Item into Treasure container bug.
1.12.2.1.3.5:
Updated to use GottschCore v1.7
Added Cauldron Chest (epic).
Added Skeleton Block.
Added Marker Generator.
Fixed world.isRemote() checks with GottschCore call WorldInfo.isServer/Client().
Expose custom loot tables.
Use of GottschCore Loot Tables system instead of Treasure2s.
Fixed so that Skeletons can be placed in Fog.
1.12.2.1.3.6:
Fixed Coin toss in well crash bug.
Removed all references to old Loot Tables setup (in ref to coin/well bug).
Fix foreign mod loot table registering.
Updated mocreates, sgs metals loot tables to point to right loot tables.
1.12.2.1.3.7: Fixed bug where Treasure items werent being added to chests.
1.12.2.1.4.1:
Added Structures and Structure files.
Update MobTrapPitGenerator to use Proximity Spawners.
Fixed World Generators map - use Enum instead of String.
Refactor Pit selection code.
1.12.2.1.4.2:
Fixed DataFixer server-side crash.
Fixed AbstractChestGenerator crash.
Removed Structure Pit Generators that didnt make sense, ie. Big Bottom, Lava Trap.
Expanded code when retrieving chest coords from pit structure.
1.12.2.1.4.3:
Fixed AbstractChestGenerator crash again -> Found edges cases that didnt return StructureInfo on Structure gens.
Fixed findUndergroundCeiling() call.
1.12.2.1.5.0:
Expose/Add custom structure locations.
Set Key max uses as configurable.
Added Chinese language file. Thanks to qyhao.
Added new config options - toggle default loot table and templates enforcement.
Removed references to mod_present condition on loot tables.
Fix WitherRoot and WitherBranch blocks placement.
Added meta file system.
Added underwater structures.
Added more treasure room structures.
1.12.2.1.5.1: Fixed Server crash on load - due to biome.getName().
1.12.2.1.6.0:
Added White and Black Pearls.
Updated Rare and Epic loot tables with pearls.
All Generators implement IGenerator.
Refactored WellGenerators to use Structures.
Refactored AbstractChestGenerator.
Fixed stacked coins only return 1 loot item bug.
Fixed Wishing Well loot selection.
Fixed all Structure rotation spawn points and checks.
Update all commands be prefixed with t2-.
1.12.2.1.6.2: Removed GUI config that was inadvertently added last update.
1.12.2.1.6.3: Removed debugging code that was causing underwater structures to generate too frequently.
1.12.2.1.7.0:
Refactored config files into one GUI config.
Added Desert Wishing Well block.
Fixed Rarity enum value mappings.
Persisted ChestRegistry.
Fixed Well generation on podzol/mycelium generating mushroom block instead of mushrooms.
Reconfigured folder locations where logging and resource files go (moved out of /mods folder.)
Using GottschCore v1.9.0.
*Fixed chests not generating in some pits.
*Fixed world properties not clearing between game world loads.
Fixed loading of ChestRegistry.
1.12.2.1.8.0:
Added Decay System.
Added 8 surface structures.
Added SpawnRuins command.
Fixed/enable other spawn commands.
Added Spanish translation.
Added Russian translation.
Fixed the number of uses a Key has.
Removed Lombok library.
Fixed solid base check for Surface/Submerged ruins.
Fixed Wither Tree crash bug.
Using GottschCore v1.10.0.
1.12.2.1.9.0:
Added Spider Chest.
Added recipes for all grave/tombstones.
Fixed config white/black lists on change.
All logging config options require mc restart.
Added config whitelist for dimensions.
Added ability to pass template holder into IRuinGenerators.
Updated all SpawnCommands to work from Command blocks.
Adding fill blocks for under structures so there isnt any overhang when on cliffs etc.
Using GottschCore v1.11.0.
Added 2 surface structures.
Fixed *huge* bug with decay processor not picking the correct rule.
1.12.2.1.10.0:
Replaced fog blocks with mist particles around gravestone and wither trees.
Added Bound Soul mob.
Added Collapsing Trap Pit.
Added 2 submerged structures.
Added beached shipwrecks.
Added skeleton, zombie and creeper heads to epic loot table.
Added config option to turn off gem ores gen.
Added config option to toggle default decay ruleset file enforcement.
Added config option to turn off starting book.
Updated spanish lang file.
Using GottschCore 1.12.1
1.12.2.1.11.0:
Added Viking Chest.
Added some environmentals to Wither Tree grove.
Added Oasis framework and added Desert Oasis.
Added 2 surface structures.
Fixed Collpasing Trap Pit in deserts.
Registered Ruby and Sapphire with OreDict as gemRuby, gemSappphire.
Fixed loot table error.
Fixed Wither Chest bug.
Resized pearls textures to look more like pearls and less like snowballs.
1.12.2.1.11.1: Fixed server error on Wither tree gen. Fixed server crash when breaking gravestones.
1.12.2.1.12.0:
Added Charms system.
Added Pouches (Coin Pouch, Lucky Pouch, Apprentice's Pouch, Master's Pouch).
Added versions to all loot table files - if new versions made, old version will be backed up as .bak files.
Added Charms to loot tables.
Added relative positioning for t2-chest command.
Convert KeyRing to use Capabilities.BACKUP your world, you will lose KeyRing items on update!
Using GottschCore v1.13.0.
